name: rnaseqlib
body:
### rnaseqlib: a simple, lightweight pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis
``rnaseqlib`` is a pipeline for processing RNA-Seq data. It currently supports:

* mRNA-Seq
* Ribo-Seq: Ribosome profiling/footprinting
* CLIP-Seq

It works for any standard UCSC genome. Please see [rnaseqlib.readthedocs.org](http://rnaseqlib.readthedocs.org) for details and documentations.

### Author
``rnaseqlib`` was written by Yarden Katz (@yarden)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
